summary: Really thinking about the possibility that the Groke may have been there at the beginning of Snufkin’s nightmare in Moominvalley...
body: Really thinking about the possibility that the Groke may have been there at the beginning of Snufkin’s nightmare in Moominvalley 2019’s episode 2. He heard a deep, distorted voice close by in the woods and then quickly thought he needs to get moving, and his breath was foggy from the cold. That nightmare was all about Snufkin’s fears and later in the Groke episode he was the one who thought that maybe the Groke ‘reflects our own fears’.

reblog.comment: Really thinking about the possibility that the Groke may have been there at the beginning of Snufkin’s nightmare in Moominvalley 2019’s episode 2. He heard a deep, distorted voice close by in the woods and then quickly thought he needs to get moving, and his breath was foggy from the cold. That nightmare was all about Snufkin’s fears and later in the Groke episode he was the one who thought that maybe the Groke ‘reflects our own fears’.

trail.content_raw: Really thinking about the possibility that the Groke may have been there at the beginning of Snufkin’s nightmare in Moominvalley 2019’s episode 2. He heard a deep, distorted voice close by in the woods and then quickly thought he needs to get moving, and his breath was foggy from the cold. That nightmare was all about Snufkin’s fears and later in the Groke episode he was the one who thought that maybe the Groke ‘reflects our own fears’.
trail.content: Really thinking about the possibility that the Groke may have been there at the beginning of Snufkin’s nightmare in Moominvalley 2019’s episode 2. He heard a deep, distorted voice close by in the woods and then quickly thought he needs to get moving, and his breath was foggy from the cold. That nightmare was all about Snufkin’s fears and later in the Groke episode he was the one who thought that maybe the Groke ‘reflects our own fears’.

summary: "I'm a tramp, and I live all over the place," answered Snufkin. "I wander about, and when I find a place that I like I put up my...
body: “I’m a tramp, and I live all over the place,” answered Snufkin. “I wander about, and when I find a place that I like I put up my tent and play my mouth-organ.”

reblog.comment: “I’m a tramp, and I live all over the place,” answered Snufkin. “I wander about, and when I find a place that I like I put up my tent and play my mouth-organ.”

trail.content_raw: “I’m a tramp, and I live all over the place,” answered Snufkin. “I wander about, and when I find a place that I like I put up my tent and play my mouth-organ.”

blog.name: incorrect--moomin--quotes
blog.title: Definitely Correct Moomin Quotes
blog.description: Echo | gender-void omniromantic and ace | snufkin is best boi | these are all set in a modern au unless it says otherwise in the post | ive always loved moomin since i was very little so ya enjoy! | other blogs are at incorrect--danny--phantom & pastel--space--kitten

tags: snufkin and little my bonding in the forest
summary: ~~~Little my and Snufkin bonding in the forest p. 3~~~
body:
~~~Little my and Snufkin bonding in the forest p. 3~~~

Little My: Me, I’m a girl of action. You have to act first and apologize later, like I have learned to do

Snufkin: You never apologize

Little My: I would if I’d ever been wrong
